channel.title: Anxiety on Ghostdogs
channel.description: Recent content in Anxiety on Ghostdogs

item.title: Finding Answers
item.description: Wednesday and Thursday this past week Tam has shown some very difficult behaviour at school.

item.title: How Far Have We Come?
item.description: I decided I was going to review the month of September half way through and again at the end. I put this on my to-do list months ago and I have forgotten why. All I can think is that I did it for a reason so here goes.

item.title: Respite Part 1
item.description: Today me and Tam were separated for longest time. We spent 6 hours apart on a weekend. Yes, we are separate when Tam goes to school. This was only the second time in the last 18 months that we have been separate, but the last time I was in the same building. Today Tam went to a respite centre with me and I left him there. He went off to the beach and I went home.
